actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to extend for three years the programs for comprehensive State and areawide health planning, and for comprehensive public health service and health services development, and to repeal a requirement that at least 15 percent of a State's formula allotment for public health services be available only for mental health services.

summary.text: Extends for three years the programs under the Public Health Service Act for comprehensive State and areawide health planning, and for comprehensive public health service and health services development. Provides for the repeal of the requirement that at least 15 percent of a State's formula allotment for public health services be available only for mental health services.

titles.title: A bill to extend for three years the programs for comprehensive State and areawide health planning, and for comprehensive public health service and health services development, and to repeal a requirement that at least 15 percent of a State's formula allotment for public health services be available only for mental health services.
